price: Kuma Muka yi musu kyauta daga Rahamar Mu, kuma Muka sanya musu harshen gaskiya* maɗaukaki.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُم مِّن رَّحۡمَتِنَا وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ لِسَانَ صِدۡقٍ عَلِيّٗا
footnotes: * Harshen gaskiya, shi ne yabo mai kyau daga Allah da mutãne. Wanda ya yankewa mutãnenSa dõmin Allah, to, zai sãka masa da waɗansu mutãnen kirki dõmin su ɗebe masa kewa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahum min raḥmatinā wajaʿalnā lahum lisāna ṣid'qin ʿaliyyan
